title: Includes in class A misdemeanor of dissemination of an unlawful surveillance image in the second degree, dissemination of image to porn website without consent
summary: Includes in class A misdemeanor of dissemination of an unlawful surveillance image in the second degree, the dissemination of an image of a person to a computer network internet website that is obscene, without the consent or knowledge of the person in the image.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          743

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sens.  YOUNG,  DeFRANCISCO,  RANZENHOFER, SALAND -- read
         twice and ordered printed, and when printed to  be  committed  to  the
         Committee on Codes

       AN  ACT  to  amend the penal law, in relation to prohibiting the dissem-
         ination of any image of a person to an obscene internet website, with-
         out such person's knowledge or consent

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Section 250.55 of the penal law, as added by chapter 69 of
    2  the laws of 2003, is amended to read as follows:
    3  S 250.55 Dissemination of an unlawful surveillance image in  the  second
    4             degree.
    5    A  person is guilty of dissemination of an unlawful surveillance image
    6  in the second degree when [he]:
    7    1. HE or she, with knowledge of the unlawful conduct by which an image
    8  or images of the sexual or other intimate parts  of  another  person  or
    9  persons were obtained and such unlawful conduct would satisfy the essen-
   10  tial  elements  of  the  crime  of unlawful surveillance in the first or
   11  second degree, intentionally disseminates such image or images[.]; OR
   12    2. WITHOUT THE KNOWLEDGE OR CONSENT  OF  ANOTHER  PERSON,  HE  OR  SHE
   13  DISSEMINATES  AN IMAGE OF SUCH OTHER PERSON TO A COMPUTER NETWORK INTER-
   14  NET WEBSITE WHICH HE OR SHE KNOWS IS OBSCENE, AS DEFINED IN  SUBDIVISION
   15  ONE OF SECTION 235.00 OF THIS CHAPTER.
   16    Dissemination  of  an unlawful surveillance image in the second degree
   17  is a class A misdemeanor.
   18    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
   19  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02697-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to prohibiting the dissemination of any image of a person to an obscene internet website, without such person's knowledge or consent
